metadata.title: Tuesday, 12th November, 2024
metadata.session: FOURTH SESSION OF THE THIRTEENTH ASSEMBLY

parts: (a) whether the Government is aware that the poor internet service and direct calls connectivity being experienced in Luwingu District and the country at large, has adversely affected businesses, such that they are unable to perform statutory obligations with regulatory bodies, thereby leading to unnecessary penalties; and
(b) if so, what urgent measures the Government is taking to ensure that the problem is resolved.

questions.minister: Minister of Infrastructure, Housing and Urban Development
parts: (a) when the construction of the Mbesuma Bridge on the Isoka–Mbesuma–Kasama road will be completed;
(b) what the cause of the delay in completing the project is; and
(c) whether the construction will be completed before the rains intensify, to prevent the bridge from being washed away.

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Rural Development
parts: (a) whether the Government is aware that the inordinate delays in the appointment of members of Constituency Development Fund (CDF) Committees in Samfya District, is hampering the Government’s developmental agenda; and
(b) if so, what urgent measures are being taken to expedite the process so as to avert the CDF allocations to the constituencies in the District from being returned to the Treasury.

questions.minister: Minister of Infrastructure, Housing and Urban Development
parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to construct a bridge across Chanda River on the Nyimba-Luembe road in Nyimba Parliamentary Constituency;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented;
(c) what the estimated cost of the project is; and
(d) if there are no such plans, why.

questions.minister: Minister of Water Development and Sanitation
parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to construct dams in Kawaza and Kathumba Chiefdoms in Milanzi Parliamentary Constituency;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented;
(c) how many dams are earmarked for construction in each chiefdom; and
(d) if there are no such plans, why.

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Rural Development
parts: (a) what the rate of loan repayments under the Constituency Development Fund loan facility was, countrywide, as of August, 2024; and

(b) what measures the Government has put in place to enhance the repayment of the loans. 8.
